title: Epic 24: Wearable & Device Integration
description: Integration with wearable devices and health platforms to collect activity data, posture monitoring, sleep quality, and other health metrics for comprehensive patient monitoring.

userStories.title: Device integration schema
userStories.description: Create database models for device data and connections.
acceptanceCriteria: DeviceConnection model with patientId, deviceType, connectionToken, status
ActivityData model with patientId, date, steps, activeMinutes, calories
SleepData model with patientId, date, duration, quality, stages
PostureData model with patientId, timestamp, score, alerts
HeartRateData model with patientId, timestamp, bpm, type
DeviceType enum (AppleHealth, GoogleFit, Fitbit, Whoop, PostureSensor)
